quote: A warrior does not give up what he loves, he finds the love in what he does. – Dan Millman
fact: To escape the grip of a crocodile`s jaws, push your thumbs into its eyeballs - it will let you go instantly.
joke: Have you heard about the film "Constipation", you probably haven't because it's not out yet.
